items.summary: In `frontend/src/components/CubeVisualization.tsx`, implement a shader-based radial gradient background using an inverted sphere (skybox) mesh so the scene background is a deep purple/blue glow in the center fading to black at the edges, without using any external CSS or texture assets.

Update the scene initialization in `CubeVisualization.tsx` so the shader background mesh is visible by setting `scene.background = null`, and set fog to black using `scene.fog = new THREE.FogExp2(0x000000, 0.003)` to preserve floor fade-out behavior.
Preserve the existing renderer tone mapping exposure configuration: do not change `gl.toneMappingExposure` from `0.6` in `CubeVisualization.tsx`.
